pathology.description: Describes the pathology of the sample or type of control. If different from healthy, this SHOULD be specified.

sample_id.description: A sample identifier of the form sample-<label>, matching a sample entity found in the dataset. The combination of sample_id and participant_id MUST be unique.

sample_type.description: Biosample type defined by ENCODE Biosample Type.

derived_from.description: sample-<label> entity from which a sample is derived, e.g., sample-02 from sample-01.

participant_id.description: A participant identifier of the form sub-<label>, matching a participant entity found in the dataset. The combination of sample_id and participant_id MUST be unique.
